item.title: Win10 清除 PowerShell 历史记录
item.description: PowerShell’s own history mechanism (Get-History, Clear-History) is host-independent, which is why - somewhat unexpectedly - you also need to clear the hosts’s command history separately. As for the console host’s own history feature: doskey-style history feature, before module PSReadline shipped with PowerShell (see below): There is no saved history - a history is kept only for the duration of the current session. Alt+F7 must be used to clear the console’s
